offers.title: Buy 1 Get 1 Free - Any Sandwich
offers.description: Buy one sandwich, get one of equal or lesser value free. Show coupon to cashier. One redemption per customer.

offers.title: 10% Off Any Order
offers.description: 10% off your entire order. One redemption per customer.

offers.title: Free Side with Any Entrée
offers.description: Free side item with the purchase of any entrée. One redemption per customer.

offers.title: Free 16 oz Drink with Sandwich
offers.description: Free 16 oz drink with purchase of any sandwich. One redemption per customer.

offers.title: Free Dessert with Entrée
offers.description: Free dessert (single serving) with purchase of any entrée. One redemption per customer.
